name: App.Attributes
desc: Attributes that describe an Apps resource.

items.name: bundleId
items.desc: The bundle ID for your app. This ID must match the one you use in Xcode. The bundle ID cannot be changed after you upload your first build.

items.name: name
items.desc: The name of your app as it will appear in the App Store. The maximum length is 30 characters.

items.name: primaryLocale
items.desc: The primary locale for your app. If localized app information isnâ€™t available in an App Store territory, the information from your primary language is used instead.

items.name: sku
items.desc: A unique ID for your app that is not visible on the App Store.
